description:
The Drake Corian Mix is a premium fitted tall tee v-neck that was carefully crafted for tall men. This tall t-shirt feels amazing and fits tall guys of any height with grace.

Navas Lab is the leader in functional tall guys clothes and the Drake Corian Mix is a practical and stylish t-shirt you can wear in almost any situation.

At Navas, they are tall guys too so they know that tall guys that are also slim still struggle to find tall v-neck t-shirts that fit properly and look good. If you’re tired of XXXL and Big&Tall t-shirts that don’t look or feel good, you may have just found your new favorite shirt.

Their Drake Corian Mix premium tee comes loaded with features you will only find at Navas Lab. From the bamboo fabric blend they use to the perfect fit for tall slim guys - they are passionate about every aspect of the clothing we produce.

The proven anti-odour properties of their bamboo fabric makes these best tall tees a must-have in any wardrobe. The cut is ideal for tall slim guys and the casual look is perfect for any situation.
name: Navas Lab Apparel Drake Corian Mix - Tall V-Neck Tee - Mens
